subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Tony Peña Jr. hit a two-out, tie-breaking single in the 11th inning Monday and the frugal Kansas City Royals held on to beat the big-spending Tigers, 5-4, on opening day in Detroit to give Trey Hillman a victory in his major league debut as a manager.
